response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge. The next step is to take the duck out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the duck out of the fridge
(4) Cook the duck
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take the duck out of the fridge
    duck = registry(env,"duck_171")
    EasyGrasp(robot, duck)
    donothing(env)
